author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

I noticed (in the context of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49674) the we didn't have any tests for `EmbeddedRNTupleTempSource`, while for `EmbeddedRootSource` we have tests in `IOPool/SecondaryInput`. This PR copies those tests and adapts them to `RNTupleTemp*` IO components.

To share the same `SecondaryProducer` test module this PR moves it to `FWCore/TestModules` (and also merges the code from the header to the source file).

The last commit is cherry-picked from https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49674 .

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1730

#### PR validation:

The added unit test runs
title: Copy IOPool/SecondaryInput tests for RNTupleTemp IO
